Class SKNearbySearchSettings

java.lang.Object
  com.skobbler.ngx.search.SKNearbySearchSettings

public class SKNearbySearchSettings
extends java.lang.Object

Stores input parameters for a nearby search.

3.0

getSearchMode

public SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode getSearchMode()
Return the search mode for the search.

Returns:
search mode. Possible values are SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode.ONLINE or SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode.OFFLINE . Default value is online.

setSearchMode

public void setSearchMode(SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode searchMode)
Set the search mode for the search.

Parameters:
searchMode - new search mode.Possible values are SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode.ONLINE or SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode.OFFLINE . Default value is online.

getSearchType

public SKNearbySearchSettings.SKSearchType getSearchType()
Return the type of search.

Returns:
type of search.

setSearchType

public void setSearchType(SKNearbySearchSettings.SKSearchType searchType)
Set the type of search.

Parameters:
searchType - type of search (only pois, only streets,pois and streets). Default value is SKNearbySearchSettings.SKSearchType.POIS.

getSearchResultSortType

public SKNearbySearchSettings.SKSearchResultSortType getSearchResultSortType()
Return the type of sort.

Returns:
type of sort. Default value is SKNearbySearchSettings.SKSearchResultSortType.PROXIMITY_SORT.

setSearchResultSortType

public void setSearchResultSortType(SKNearbySearchSettings.SKSearchResultSortType searchResultSortType)
Set the type of sort.

Parameters:
searchResultSortType - type of sort. Default value is SKNearbySearchSettings.SKSearchResultSortType.PROXIMITY_SORT.

getSearchResultsNumber

maximum number of search results. Default values is 20.
